Citation_Information.author_list: Pinilla-Alonso, N., De Pra, M., De Leon, J., Morate, D., Lorenzi, V., Arredondo, A., Campins, H., Licandro, J., Delbo, M., Cabrera-Lavers, A., Walsh, K., and DeMeo, F.
Citation_Information.description: Library of spectra, observing conditions and physical parameters of the PRIMitive Ateroids Spectroscopic Surveey: visible spectral range.

Field_Delimited.name: File_name
Field_Delimited.description: Name of the file containing the spectrum

Field_Delimited.name: Number
Field_Delimited.description: Number o the asteroid according to the MPC

Field_Delimited.name: Name
Field_Delimited.description: Name of the asteroid according to the MPC

Field_Delimited.name: Family
Field_Delimited.description: Collisonal family name

Field_Delimited.name: Family ref
Field_Delimited.description: Flag to the reference where the family is defined

Field_Delimited.name: H
Field_Delimited.description: Absolute magnitude extracted from the JPL-HORIZONS shystem

Field_Delimited.name: a
Field_Delimited.description: Proper semi-major axis as calculated in the family definition. Note: For objects in the Hildas and Cybeles groups we provide osculating elements

Field_Delimited.name: e
Field_Delimited.description: Proper eccentricity as calculated in the family definition. Note: For objects in the Hildas and Cybeles groups we provide osculating elements

Field_Delimited.name: i
Field_Delimited.description: Proper inclination as calculated in the family definition. Note: For objects in the Hildas and Cybeles groups we provide osculating elements

Field_Delimited.name: Albedo
Field_Delimited.description: Geometric albedo at 0.55 microns as provided by NEOWISE (Mainzer et al. XXX)

Field_Delimited.name: Albedo_err
Field_Delimited.description: Error associated with the geometric albedo

Field_Delimited.name: Diameter
Field_Delimited.description: Diameter of the asteroid as provided by NEOWISE (Mainzer et al. XXX)

Field_Delimited.name: Diameter_err
Field_Delimited.description: Error associated with the diameter

Field_Delimited.name: Start_t
Field_Delimited.description: Time for the starting of the observations

Field_Delimited.name: Stop_t
Field_Delimited.description: Time for the ending of the observations

Field_Delimited.name: N_exp
Field_Delimited.description: Number of exposures

Field_Delimited.name: Tot_exp
Field_Delimited.description: Total exposure time

Field_Delimited.name: Airmass
Field_Delimited.description: Airmass at the starting of the observation

Field_Delimited.name: M_v
Field_Delimited.description: V magnitude from JPL-HORIZONS (ver c√≥mo se llama oficialmente) at the time of the observations

Field_Delimited.name: alpha
Field_Delimited.description: Phase angle at the time of the observation

Field_Delimited.name: r
Field_Delimited.description: Geocentric distance at the time of the observation

Field_Delimited.name: delta
Field_Delimited.description: Heliocentric distance at the time of the observation

Field_Delimited.name: Solar_analog
Field_Delimited.description: List of the solar analogs used to obtain the relative reflectance spectrum

Field_Delimited.name: Spectrum ref
Field_Delimited.description: Flag to the reference where the spectrum is published
